body: Do you want to work in an agile and fun work environment along with your colleagues from Romania and Netherlands?We have a job for you! We are looking for several .Net Developers to join our office from Bucharest. You will become part of a team in charge with developing large-scale software solutions for energy brokerage using Microsoft .Net technologies. Your role will be to: Develop and maintain a SaaS product delivered through an Agile approach; Develop, test and put in production programs launching; Assist in drawing up and validate technical specifications; Bring insightful ideas to optimize the tasks at hand; Investigate new technologies, techniques and research ongoing industry developments. Technical skills: 3 years of hands-on development experience of core .NET (3.5/4.0) technology and Object Oriented Programming, including (not limited to) ASP.NET, C#; 3 years of experience in relational database design and development, preferable SQL Server 2012 – 2014; Solid understanding of programming concepts; Excellent knowledge of design patterns; Expertise in data structures and algorithms; Relevant experience on web client in JavaScript, JQuery, AngularJS.What we offer: Motivating and competitive salary package; Teambuilding and business traveling (e.g.: Netherlands, Portugal, Austria, Italy, Belgium, UK, and Spain); Open and friendly work environment. Do you want to discover more about us? Send us an e-mail at hr@dotware.ro or visit our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/dotware.ro
title: .Net Developer
locations: Str. Virtutii 1E Bucuresti - www.facebook.com/dotware.ro, București, Municipiul București, România
